adqlParser.query
Class ColumnReference

java.lang.Object
  adqlParser.query.ColumnReference
All Implemented Interfaces:
ADQLObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
ADQLOrder
public class ColumnReference
extends java.lang.Object
implements ADQLObject

Represents a reference to a selected column either by an index or by a name/alias.

Version:
06/2010
Author:
Grégory Mantelet (CDS)

Constructor Detail

ColumnReference

public ColumnReference(int indice)
                throws ParseException
Creates a column reference with an index of a selected column.

Parameters:
indice - Index of a selected column (from 1).
Throws:
ParseException - If the given index is less or equal 0.

ColumnReference

public ColumnReference(java.lang.String colName)
                throws ParseException
Creates a column reference with a name/alias of a selected column.

Parameters:
colName - A column name/alias.
Throws:
ParseException - If the given name is null or is an empty string.
Method Detail

getColumnIndice

public int getColumnIndice()
Gets the index of the referenced column.

Returns:
The index of the referenced column or -1 if this column reference has been made with a column name/alias.

getColumnName

public java.lang.String getColumnName()
Gets the name/alias of the referenced column.

Returns:
The referenced column's name/alias or null if this column reference has been made with a column index.

Description copied from interface: ADQLObject

getFirst

public ADQLObject getFirst(SearchHandler searchCondition)
Description copied from interface: ADQLObject
Searches for ADQL objects which satisfy the condition implemented in the given SearchHandler instance.
ONLY THE FIRST ADQL OBJECT WHICH HAS MATCHED IS RETURNED !

Specified by:

public ADQLObject replaceBy(SearchHandler searchCondition,
                            ADQLObject replacementObject)
                     throws ParseException
Description copied from interface: ADQLObject

Specified by:
replaceBy in interface ADQLObject
Parameters:
